Text:
Just what my wife was looking for. She tried downloading the FLV files which are released by NBC for playback, but those files, even with codecs installed and the VLC player did not want to play back the video without rainbow patches of pixels.

Thanks a ton! :)
thank you a  lot, great torrent!!:)

Thank you so much! This show has to be one of my favorites of all time.
Curse NBC for cancelling it WAY before its time.

awsome...i cant believe more people do not have this though, i figured if anyone was hanging on to a show for just archiving reasons...it would most def be this one.  well, at least thats what im doing, ive already seen it, i just want to make sure i have it if it dissapears. thx wiley!
@Thomps6o, that's what I'm doing too. I also have the DVD of this, and I've watched the deleted scenes and audio commentary on that. I just wanted as much of this brilliant show as I could. :)
Yep, and it was such a shame that this truly marvelous show was cancelled :(

I'm still missing this show terribly :(
Also, calling this a mini-series implies a conclusion. Kings, however, was intended to be a full series with a series's ambitions. But, NBC in their infinite wisdom, decides to cancel Kings, yet let garbage like The Biggest Loser run for 10+ seasons. Long live Kings
one of the best tv shows i've ever seen. cancelled because USA is full of people who prefers to watch "reality" tv that is not realistic and american idol.
@chickoy3, I'm American and trust me, I absolutely hate all that reality crap. Kings was truly a special thing that people, for some reason, weren't smart enough to catch on to.
Been looking for this for a while now. Have heard only great things, so thanks for seeding the entire thing! Much appreciated :)
